entry.title: Road Snowfall Warning
entry.summary: Rain may briefly turn to snow about the summit between 5 and 10am Thursday, and up to 1cm may accumulate near the summit during this time. Another period of colder snow is expected Thursday afternoon and evening, and between 1 and 8 pm Thursday, 1 to 2cm may accumulate about the summit, with lesser amounts down to 600 metres.

entry.title: Road Snowfall Warning
entry.summary: Snow is expected to affect higher parts of the road Thursday evening and night. 3 to 5 cm of snow may settle near the summit, with lesser amount down to 800 metres.

entry.title: Road Snowfall Warning
entry.summary: A period of snow is possible on Thursday morning and early afternoon. Between 7am and 2pm, 1 to 2 cm may accumulate near the tunnel.

entry.title: Strong Wind Warning - Orange
entry.summary: Severe gale northwesterlies gusting 120 km/h in exposed places. Impact: Damage to trees, powerlines, and unsecured structures possible. Driving may be difficult, especially for high-sided vehicles and motorcycles. Chance of upgrading to a Red Warning: Minimal.
